issues: Some text in light colors may reduce readability against the background.
Most text boxes are right-aligned, but one element could be better positioned.
Two icons are positioned on the left; icons typically should be on the right side of the text.
Arrows are mostly correctly oriented, though one is slightly ambiguous.
Good spacing overall, but minor adjustments could enhance layout.

slides.summary: The slide is mostly well-designed but requires some adjustments for full alignment with RTL standards and visibility improvement.
recommendations: Adjust text colors for better contrast against the background.
Reposition any left-side icons to the right of the text.
Ensure all elements are consistently aligned and spaced.
